data.title: Kiss Me Before I Say Good
data.meta_description: Kiss Me Before I Say Good-Bye Lyrics, Kaytie, If life wasn't so hard, Would it even be worth
data.text:
Clean Lyric

Paragraph Lyric

If life wasn't so hard,

Would it even be worth it?

If you looked into my eyes and knew that you loved me.

I loved you, you left me.

But baby please don't go.

Slap me in the face,

Make me bleed.

If you're not going to stay with me,

Then I might as well leave.

{Chorus}

Kiss me now,

Make it last,

Kiss me forever,

Let it go.

Kiss me now,

Kiss me before I go

If life wasn't so hard, Would it even be worth it? If you looked into my eyes and knew that you loved me. I loved you, you left me. But baby please don't go. Slap me in the face, Make me bleed. If you're not going to stay with me, Then I might as well leave. {Chorus} Kiss me now, Make it last, Kiss me forever, Let it go. Kiss me now, Kiss me before I go
